response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that promises unparalleled performance and longevity. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $18,000. This price reflects its true worth and the opportunity to own a piece that stands out in terms of functionality and design. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction happen.", "product_price": 18000}
